actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to repeal section 2 of the Emergency Highway Energy Conservation Act requiring the States to establish certain speed limits not in excess of 55 miles per hour on their public highways during the current fuel shortage.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of the Emergency Highway Energy Conservation Act requiring the States to establish speed limits not in excess of fifty-five miles per hour on their public highways during the current fuel shortage.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 2 of the Emergency Highway Energy Conservation Act requiring the States to establish certain speed limits not in excess of 55 miles per hour on their public highways during the current fuel shortage.
